duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop residential architectural designs with a focus on residential remodeling and building code compliance.
Utilize CAD Drafting tools such as AutoCAD, Revit, and Chief Architect for design and rendering.
Communicate with residential clients and translate their ideas into architectural plans within budget constraints.
Ensure accuracy of details, plans, and material planning considering construction costs.

education_certification.credential: Non-registered graduate of an Architectural professional degree program with 2+ years of post-degree experience in a related field.
Strong understanding of building codes & requirements.
Previous experience working with and at ease with residential clients, assessing their unique needs and translating those ideas into plans within budget.
Proficient in hand drawing skills, space planning, finishes selections, and the use of CAD software like AutoCAD, Revit, and Chief Architect.
